sentences.sContent: All she did was hang around ogling the men in the factory.
sentences.sCn: 她就只会在工厂里四处乱逛，朝男人抛媚眼。

sentences.sContent: Paula is not used to everyone ogling at her while she undresses backstage.
sentences.sCn: 葆拉还不习惯在后台换衣服时所有人都色迷迷地盯着她看。

remMethod.val: “偶 (我) 钩” → 用抛媚眼的方式钩我 → 抛媚眼

trans.tranOther: If you say that one person is ogling another, you disapprove of them continually staring at that person in a way that indicates a strong sexual interest
